text: Melum, allah or urai (avarkalukku) utaranan kurukiran; atu accamillatum, nim'matiyutanum iruntatu, atan unavu(m marrum valkkai)p porutkal yavum ovvoritattiliruntum eralamaka vantu kontiruntana - anal (avvur) allahvin arut kotaikalukku nanri celuttamal maru ceytatu akave, avvurar ceytu kontirunta (tic) ceyalkalin karanamaka, allah paciyaiyum payattaiyum avarkalukku ataiyaka (anivittu avarrai) anupavikkumaru ceytan
